jobs.title: Senior IT Assistant (ERP System)
jobs.description:
Must support to ERP Software operation, Tablet sales and promotion schemes for ERP System.
Troubleshooting and solving ERP System.
Troubleshooting system issues, provide systems support and training to users.
Good knowledge on application deployment & maintenance methodology.
Design and testing of new enhancements / integrations / reports for application systems.
Performs other related duties as assigned
jobs.requirement:
Bachelor of Computer Science (B.C.Sc), any IT Diploma or equivalent preferred.
Age between 25 to 30.
minimum 3 years of experience in IT field.
Good Computer Knowledge, Microsoft Office and Excel .
Must understand ERP software operation, tablet sales and promotion scheme for ERP System.
Ability to communicate effectively at all levels within an organization

jobs.title: School Counselor
jobs.description: Yangon American International School is an innovative leading-edge independent college-preparatory school offering an American-based education.  This coeducational institution features the Common Core State Standards to provide a total learning experience designed to promote the maximum potential of students to prepare them for the university and beyond. More importantly, a rigorous academically-centered education will better prepare students for the future. Yangon American was founded in 2018 with the mission of offering an academically rigorous program to children of all nationalities in Yangon to prepare them for the university.
jobs.requirement:
Master’s degree in school counseling and guidance.  
At least 2 years’ experience working with children.  
Demonstrate knowledge of curriculum development related to social emotional learning 
Strong communication skill 
Ability to navigate and problem solve unforeseen scenario

jobs.title: Deputy Head Of HR
jobs.description:
Manage day-to-day HR operation function such as recruitment, compensation and benefit and employee relation to be able to achieve target in the time frame.
Review and develop future-ready Human Resource policies and strategies, referencing local and global HR trends and best practices.
Lead HR transformation programs, incorporating changes in strategy, structure, people, process and systems, to achieve HR technology, service and operational excellence.
Look across a series of data and anticipate implications of business activity on HR practices.
Perform market sensing by obtaining and maintaining knowledge of competitive practices within relevant labor markets such as industry, local, and professional competitors.
Understand the business strategy and determine its implications on the workforce.
Manage resistance, objections and conflicts during conversations in a firm, respectful and empathetic manner.
jobs.requirement:
Bachelor degree in Management/HR or any discipline with HR Diploma.
Master degree is preferable.
Minimum 8 years’ experience in HR and minimum 3 years’ experience in leadership role.
Banking experience is a plus.
Good personality and excellent communication
English language proficiency and digital-oriented.
